name: Simpletable
tagline: jQuery plugin for practical HTML table handling
body:
simpleTable jQuery-plugin
===========

jQuery plugin for practical HTML table handling.

* content editable 
* add rows 
* delete rows 
* filterable content 
* defined height 
* defined width 
* scrollable content 
* fixed header 
* live database update 
* small file size
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
